Andy & Ally

ARE GETTING MAUI’D!

Hawaii Twenty sixteen

i love you neither
with my heart
nor with my mind.
my heart might
stop.
my mind might
forget.
i love you with my
soul because
my soul never
stops or forgets.

-rumi

TAKE A Vacation

SOAK IN THE Sun

Relax ON THE Beach

Swim AND HAVE Fun

SO PLEASE Save Our Date

AND WE CAN ALL Celebrate!

FLY SOUTH TO THE Breathtaking Maui

FOR THE UNION OF Andy & Ally

Festivites

the happy couple will say “i do” with their toes in the sand surrounded by their dearest friends and family. The ceremony will be on a beach near kukahiko estate in kihei, hawaii on the eleventh of november twenty sixteen at five o’clock in the evening.


please park at the estate and a shuttle will promptly take you to the ceremony site. fabulous food, fun and festivities will take place immediately following the ceremony!
